backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Gratitude Journal backend, implementing user profile management, theme preferences, and journal entry CRUD with image support, protected by role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two UI changes to EntryCard.tsx: making journal entry text full-width and repositioning edit/delete buttons to a dedicated bottom toolbar row.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source file paths to short descriptions summarizing the purpose and recent changes of each component, hook, and config file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the light and dark color themes used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA, mounting the app at the #root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that orchestrates authentication state, profile setup flow, theme initialization, and renders the main journal UI with EntryForm and EntriesList.
frontend/src/components/EntriesList.tsx: Fetches and renders all user journal entries sorted by most recent first, with loading skeletons and an empty-state prompt.
frontend/src/components/EntryCard.tsx: Card component for a single journal entry displaying full-width text, a bottom toolbar with Add Photo, Edit/Delete (or Save/Cancel) buttons, inline editing with speech-to-text, image thumbnails with a full-screen viewer, and delete confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/EntryForm.tsx: A form component for creating gratitude journal entries with text input, optional image attachments, and speech-to-text support, requiring authentication before submission.
frontend/src/components/ImageUpload.tsx: An image upload component that allows selecting multiple image files, displays previews with upload progress indicators, and supports removal of individual images.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: The main app layout wrapper providing a sticky header with branding, login button, theme toggle, and a footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, showing appropriate loading and authenticated states.
frontend/src/components/PhotoViewer.tsx: A fullscreen lightbox component for viewing journal entry images with keyboard navigation support and previous/next controls.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: A one-time profile setup form that collects the user's name and saves it with a default system theme preference.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: A button that cycles through light, dark, and system theme modes, displaying the corresponding icon with a tooltip label.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profile CRUD, theme preference, and journal entry operations (create, read, update, delete, image management).
Custom hook wrapping the Web Speech API to provide start/stop listening controls, live transcript state, and a supported-feature flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Custom hook managing light/dark/system theme state, syncing with the authenticated user's backend preference and applying the resolved theme class to the document root.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for a warm color palette in both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters (including hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with OKLCH color tokens, custom border radii, font family, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the current task: making journal entry text full-width and repositioning edit/delete buttons in EntryCard.tsx, with two pending feature requirements.
